content: k5 k2tog x 8 k2 k2tog r8 - k1 k2tog x 8 k1 r9 - k2tog x 8 k1 9sts using a tapestry needle thread your yarn through the last over sts 7 8 9 and pull the yarn through to close the hat weave in the end part 5 - the icord strings make 2 using your dpns pick three sts on the corner of the hat and knit icord for 25 cm bind off and weave in the ends your hat/bonnet is finished
